Home Round and Structured

Round and Structured

Red Round and Structured

Aroma: Plum, Cherry, Chocolate, Dried Fig, Cedar, Tobacco, Red Plum, Blackberry, Cocoa, Strawberry
Serving Suggestion: 16C
Food Pairing: Roasted & Grilled Meats, Red Pasta Sauce, Hard cheese, BBQ
Grape Variety: Merlot, Petit Verdot, Malbec, Grenache, Tempranillo, Nebbiolo, Barbera, Sangiovese, Refosco, Raboso, Petit Syrah, Pinotage
